title.native: 俺だけ入れる隠しダンジョン
title.english: The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter

description:
The Hidden Dungeon is a place of legend where rare treasures and items are hidden. Noir, the third son of an impoverished noble family who's lost the one job offer he had, was lucky enough to hear about this dungeon. He then acquires a skill that allows him to create, bestow, and edit skills... and in order to use it, he needs to accumulate points by carrying out such tasks as eating delicious meals and doing sexual things with alluring members of the opposite sex.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Special training in the Secret Dungeon!
ดันเจี้ยนที่มีแต่ข้าเท่านั้นที่เข้าได้ ～แอบฝึกปรืนจนบรรลุสู่สุดแกร่ง～

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Feet
tags.description: Features the sexual depiction or stimulation of a character's feet.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

node.description: Coala Mode. is a Japanese unit from Yokohama consisting of vocalist Annyu (あんにゅ) and sound creator Obata Yasuhiro (小幡康裕).
_Note: Not to be confused with either the [producer](https://anilist.co/staff/193510/), or the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/187920/) by the same name._

__[Website](https://spiraspica.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/spiraspica) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/spiraspica/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcrVKHnn9O3z0Ao6sUPE7nA)__

__Formed:__ 2013
__Genres:__ J-POP, Rock (Pop Rock)

__Introduction:__
Spira Spica is a Japanese three-piece pop rock band under record labels Tower Records and Sacra Music (2018–), affiliated with the entertainment office Sony Music Artists.

__Biography:__
The band initially formed and began activities in 2013 under the name Snowman. Originally the band only consisted of childhood friends Yuuji and Masuda, but they were later joined by the vocalist Mikiha, who had initially heard of the band after they announced they were looking for a female vocalist.

On January 6, 2018, the band announced they would change their band name from Snowman to Spira Spica, which they have used since.

__Members:__
- [Mikiha](https://anilist.co/staff/169459) (幹葉) – vocalist, in-charge of lyrics
- Yuuji Teranishi (寺西裕二) – guitarist
- Masuda (ますだ) – bassist

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/erickbglx) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/erickbglx/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/ErickDublou)

Erick Bougleux is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, and dubbing director.

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mkh0614) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kanbajyanaiyo/)__

__Mikiha__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist and member of the band [Spira Spica](https://anilist.co/staff/140231/Spira-Spica).

Twitter __Ryou Eguchi__ is a Japanese producer, composer and arranger. He was the producer of the Japanese rock-band School Food Punishment between 2008 until 2012 when the band officially disbanded. He later joined la la larks, with previous members from the band School Food Punishment as their producer.
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.

[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rita-wang-86533034)

Rita Wang is the president of the Japanese branch of Crunchyroll and its Head of Acquisition.
